snippet: The girl, Rusroshi Barua, and a younger sibling somehow became locked in the bathroom of the apartment, where she fell from a window.
abstract: Police say 3-year-old Rusroshi Barua died after falling six stories from window of her family's apartment in Queens borough of New York City.
lead_paragraph: The girl, Rusroshi Barua, and a younger sibling somehow became locked in the bathroom of the apartment, where she fell from a window.

headline.seo: 3-Year-Old Died After Falling From Building in Queens
